tool_description:
Free API for getting upcoming schedule and live score for the NHL. Read more: https://algobook.info/docs/nhl-schedule-api

Explore all our free APIs: https://algobook.info/apis
name: NHL Schedule API - Algobook
title: NHL Schedule API - Algobook

api_list.name: Get schedule and scores
api_list.description: Getting schedule and scores by date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nhl-schedule-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/nhl/schedule/2024-02-23"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhl-schedule-api-algobook.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
